meanings.definition: The act of making things agree or correspond.
meanings.sent1: The harmonization of colors in the painting created a sense of unity.
meanings.sent2: The harmonization of voices in the choir performance was beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The harmonization of flavors in the dish made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: The harmonization of ideas in the meeting led to a breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: The harmonization of instruments in the orchestra was truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The process of combining different elements into a pleasing whole.
meanings.sent1: The harmonization of ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: The harmonization of furniture in the room gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent3: The harmonization of patterns in the design made it look unique.
meanings.sent4: The harmonization of scents in the room created a relaxing atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The harmonization of sounds in the music piece was incredibly soothing.
